item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Excerpts from John Wiegley and Adam Porter about personal information management (49 points | 11 comments)

3. What Came First, The egg or the chicken? An ancient unicellular says egg (28 points | 32 comments)

23. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (364 points | 176 comments)

27. The decline of the working musician (116 points | 121 comments)
28. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs, docs, and images into usable data (95 points | 51 comments)
29. It's time for a modern synthesis kernel (2019) (44 points | 6 comments)
30. Australia proposes ban on social media for those under 16 (377 points | 394 comments)
